      double PSL.computeEnumeratorInProbabilityExpression(Path path) 
      abstract double RUM.computeEnumeratorInProbabilityExpression(Path path)
      This crucial method determines the probability of routes by calculating the enumerator in the RUM probability expression; for an MNL this would be: exp(-theta*v_i) in p_i = exp(-theta*V_i)/sum_i(exp(-theta*V_i)).
